p: To verify if the increased numbers of memory B cells resulted in a more powerful antibody response in Ifitm3 -/- mice after TIV immunization, we detected the antibody level after a third TIV vaccination ( Figure 6a). The third immunization was implemented at day 7 after the booster vaccination. HI and IgG were detected at days 0 (for twice vaccination), 7 (for third vaccination), 14, 21, 28 and 32. The HI and IgG levels were lower in Ifitm3 -/- mice at day 7 after boosting compared with WT mice, then strongly increased at day 14 (day 7 after third boosting) ( Figure 6b, c). Despite this, the HI and IgG level of Ifitm3 -/- mice remained lower than WT mice and there was no significant difference between WT and Ifitm3 -/- mice.
